description:
Spacious, bright and sunny luxurious apartment on a quiet tree-lined street in Greenpoint.

South facing with an open layout.Full sized appliances including a dishwasher.Large bathroom with a tub. King size bed and very spacious closets.

Plenty of storage space.Laundry room in building. Around the corner from G train close to 7 train, east River ferry, McCarren and Transmitter Park.Galeries, boutique stores, yoga, cafe's and restaurants all within a couple blocks.
name: All inclusive private oasis in  buzzing Greenpoint
